name: Above The Ground 2020
description:
You are a box that comes from underground, now you are finally out, however various obstacles hinder your freedom, overcome cliffs and destroy your enemies, only then can you say that you are finally above the ground!

Music

Level 6th, 7th and 8th music: created by djgriffin (https://freesound.org/people/djgriffin/)

Other musics: freesound (https://freesound.org/) 

Scripts

Created by Lorenzo_774 (https://lorenzo-774.itch.io/)

Graphics

Created by Lorenzo_774 (https://lorenzo-774.itch.io/)


A very cool platform game!

Play it now! It's free!
